title: Confusion
content:
ate 3. Confusion is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Confusion Information

Description: Befuddle a group creatures, causing them to attack at random, wander around aimlessly, and occasionally skip turns in the stupor. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: WIS Save
